Skull Cannon.name: Skull Cannon

unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test .

default_wargear: 1 Skull Cannon This model is equipped with: skull cannon; attendants’ hellblades; biting maw.

Soul Grinder.name: Soul Grinder

ranged.name: Torrent of burning blood ignores cover torrent

unit.name: Scuttling Walker
unit.description: Each time this model makes a Normal or Advance move, it can move over friendly MONSTER and VEHICLE models and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

default_wargear: 1 Soul Grinder This model is equipped with: harvester cannon; iron claw; warpsword.

Accursed Cultists.name: Accursed Cultists

unit.name: Accursed Horde
unit.description: Each time an enemy unit has shot, if one or more models from this unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, this unit can make a Horde move. To do so, roll one D6: this unit can be moved a number of inches up to the result, but this unit must finish that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT ). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. A unit cannot make a Horde move while it is Battle-shocked .

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Cultist Firebrand Dark Apostle Dark Commune Rogue Psyker

default_wargear: 3-6 Torments 5-10 Mutants Every Torment is equipped with: hideous mutations. Every Mutant is equipped with: blasphemous appendages.

unit.name: Despoilers
unit.description: Each time this unit makes a Dark Pact , until the end of the phase, each time a model in this unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll .

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Chaos Lord In Terminator Armour Sorcerer In Terminator Armour

default_wargear: 1 Terminator Champion 4-9 Chaos Terminators Every model is equipped with: combi-bolter; accursed weapon.

unit.name: Chaos Icon

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units

Fellgor Beastmen.name: Fellgor Beastmen

unit.name: Bestial Raiders
unit.description: If this unit starts the game in Strategic Reserves , it can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase , regardless of any mission rules. If this unit is in Strategic Reserves, for the purposes of setting up this unit on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.

default_wargear: 1 Fellgor Champion 9 Fellgor Beastmen The Fellgor Champion is equipped with: bolt pistol; chainsword. Every Fellgor Beastman is equipped with: autopistol; close combat weapon.
